DigitalVerification.name: DigitalVerification
DigitalVerification.description: Stores information about the verification of a related record

Comment.description: Stores additional comments about the verification.

DesignatedVerifierId.description: The user or user group who can provide verification for a parent reference record.

DigitalVerificationSetupDetailId.description: The details associated with the digital verification setup record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed a record indirectly; for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the digital verification record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

ParentReferenceRecordId.description: The parent reference record that is verified.

PostVerificationMessage.description: The message that is displayed after a verification is performed.

PreVerificationMessage.description: The message that is displayed before a verification is performed.

VerificationDateTime.description: The date and time when the verification of the related record was done.

VerificationRequestDateTime.description: The date and time when the verification was requested.

VerificationSite.description: The place where the verification is done.

VerificationStatus.description: The status of verification for the parent reference record.

VerificationStatusCategory.description: The status category of the verification for the parent reference record.

VerifiedById.description: The user who performed the verification.

VerifierOrder.description: The order of the verifier who performed the verification.
